author: bmahakud
body:
- The fixes added is supposed to enhance the L3 Outside-in reconstruction efficiency up to 1-2%
- Adding stepping helix propagator to propagate from muon station to the outer tracker surface 
- Then propagation to tracker volume starts from the TSOS at this surface using the "PropagatorWithMaterialParabolicMf"
- layer count fix 
- adding one more parameter to decide when to create seeds using TSOS from muon system
title: Tracker seed generator fix april52018
